combatSkills.name: Game Changer
combatSkills.description: [Foes] Ultra Thunder P.Attack w/temp Str. Boost w/Hi Unguard Rate and Agi.-40%/1 turn & [Allies] Agi.+40%

combatSkills.name: Havoc Assault
combatSkills.description: [Foes] Fast Lo Thunder P.Attack w/Hi Critical Rate & Str., Mag. and P.Resist-25%/3 turns

combatSkills.name: Fallen Bastion
combatSkills.description: [Foes] Slow Super Thunder P.Attack w/temp Str. Boost & removes Dmg. Reduction Skill (Attack Type: All and Single Targets) exc. Assist Skills

combatSkills.name: Arc Sweep
combatSkills.description: [Foe] Slow Hi Thunder P.Attack w/temp Str. Boost & removes Dmg. Reduction Skill (Attack Type: All and Single Targets) exc. Assist Skills

passiveSkills.name: Will of Thunder
passiveSkills.description: When countering and attacking, regular P.Attack a Foe with Thunder Element.
